roleset.name: translate a coded message into readable message

role.descr: end state, translation when separate mention from arg 1

example.name: passive
example.text: My brother Misu, it seems that your insults are of two kinds: one encoded *none* and the other decoded *none*.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Mary and John decoded the message from binary into Farsi.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'decode' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'translate'.
